amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funds for the Office of the National Nuclear Security Administration Administrator by $88,923,000 and to increase funds for the Defense Environmental Cleanup Management Fund by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds for Defense Nuclear Nonproliferation Office of the Administrator by $40 million and increse funds for Environmental and Other Defense Activities Defense Environmental Cleanup by $40 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pearce amendment (A025) Failed by voice vote.
